name: Step-buddy
tagline: The Simple Fitness Application Made Just For You
body:
### So Easy Anyone Can Lose Weight
Tired of all those over complicated fitness applications? Step Buddy is a simplistic fitness app that won't force you to do anything you don't want. Just simply enter your calories and the app will keep track of how much you ate that day and any day before it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
